author: _drinkcoffee
content: Olivier Begassat and Alexandre Belling are going to deliver a talk "how using the GKR protocol can improve the (constraints per hash) ratio in a SNARK by 230x" tomorrow at the Ethereum Engineering Group meet-up. The timing for this one is unfortunately not very Americas compatible: Wednesday August 18, 5pm Brisbane, Australia / 9am Paris / Midnight San Francisco. To register: https://www.meetup.com/ethereum-engineering/events/271957605/
